In this example and the main game a new level is generated every time the webpage is refreshed. If you want to reload the same level or share it with friends a link to the level code is at the bottom of the page. If you find any bugs or issues please include the game link to help me debug the problem.

After you win this level, try resetting and notice the green borders. This indicates a move that is known to lead to the winning state, so you can retrace your path to victory.

Also note if you accidentally reset just undo. Enjoy!
